name: SANDBOXDAYDREAM_Build_v1.1.5
description:
Sandboxdaydream reflects / reveals a lot about the current events happening in societies. Most importantly, the threat and liquidation of personal freedom and the disappearance of love. The player plays as a rabbit that will navigate through these rather dystopian realms.

Please feel free to support me with this game. I would love to continue with this endeavor and to explore games as a very potential medium to reach players on a different emotional level, that would hopefully leave behind a critical point of view on current world events.
